'''Uther's Clothing Factory''' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|The Woven and the Cut}}.

==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|The Woven and the Cut|Trial Character}}

==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
# Head up the stairs and approach the mechanical guide
# Follow the mechanical guide
# Investigate the Notes on the Table, Paper on the Bookshelf, and Notebook Memorandum
# Investigate the glowing spot in the fitting room
# Exit the fitting room and go left
#* {{Enemy|Recon Log Mek - Ousia|x=1}}
# Jump into the water and swim ahead
# Defeat opponents to unlock the gate {{Enemy List|Annihilation Specialist Mek - Ousia; Recon Log Mek - Ousia*2}}
#* An [[Exquisite Chest]] will unlock after defeating opponents.
# Proceed to the next room and follow the conveyor belt
# Use [[Chiori]]'s Elemental Skill to reach the next conveyor belt
#* Hold the skill to adjust the dash direction.
#* Falling into the water will put the player at the beginning of the platforming section. Characters will not be damaged or lose elemental energy.
# Head straight through the circular door
# Interact with the consoles
# Defeat opponents
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy|Recon Log Mek - Ousia|x=3}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Annihilation Specialist Mek - Ousia; Assault Specialist Mek - Ousia}}
# Ascend out of the room
#* The player can go up by riding the hydraulic presses when they hit the ground and/or using Chiori's Elemental Skill.
#* An Exquisite Chest can be found after exiting the room.
# Glide down and exit through the gate
# Head towards the unopened circular door at the upper right of the room
# Open the door using the console
#* A [[Precious Chest]] can be found on the other side.
# Jump into the water and swim through the current
# Exit the water and head up the stairs

==Notes==
* The hydraulic presses and steam cannot damage characters, only knock them over.
* During step 12, it is possible to leave the room before interacting with the consoles. However, the exit gate will be closed.
** If the player falls down to the gate, they can either jump into the water to be teleported back to the top or maneuver using Chiori's Elemental Skill.
